name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Collector's Edition
storyline:
Fight the unknown -
Climb into the cockpit of the most advanced war ever developed and ascend to the ultimate battlefield in the skies! Experience breathtaking visuals, intense dog-fighting action, a multitude of authentic and futuristic aircraft to fly and an immersive storyline where drone warfare threatens mankind!
summary: The Collector's Edition of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contained the base game, the Aces at War: A History 2019 art book, a steelbook, an emblem patch, and six emblem stickers all within a collector's box. In Korea and Taiwan, the Collector's Edition also included the Season Pass.
